content: DBS Altitude Visa Signature Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 29 Mar 2019Will I earn miles by topping up GrabPay credits from DBS Altitude Visa Card??2 answersAnswerBump0

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 21 Apr 2019Short answer, yes. The card recognise it as a transaction that will gives you 1.2 miles per dollar.If you use Grab Pay a lot, consider getting the AMEX Krisflyer card (blue one). That one earns you 3.1 mpd.0 comments1
